name: Blender Avatar
description: Control 3D avatars in Blender - real-time expressions, poses, and lip sync

set_bone_rotation.description: Rotate a bone (head, neck, spine, etc.)

look_at.description: Make avatar look at screen position

set_viseme.description: Set mouth shape for lip sync

notes: 1. Install Blender addon: forge_ai/avatar/blender_bridge.py contains BLENDER_ADDON_CODE
2. Or run: from forge_ai.avatar import save_blender_addon; save_blender_addon()
3. In Blender: Edit > Preferences > Add-ons > Install > Select the saved .py file
5. In Blender sidebar (N key) > ForgeAI tab > Click 'Start Server'
